mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE, A.MEMBER_ID, A.NICKNAME, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE, A.GENDER, A.MARRIED_STATUS, A.MEMBER_ROLE, A.WEDD_VEF, A.SIGNUP_DATE, B.POST_CODE, B.POST_TITLE, C.COMMENT_CODE, C.COMMENT_CONTEXT, D.SCHEDULE_CODE, D.SCHEDULE_TITLE FROM MEMBERS A LEFT JOIN POST B ON A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE LEFT JOIN COMMENTS C ON B.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE LEFT JOIN SCHEDULES D ON A.MEMBER_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_ROLE NOT LIKE "ADMIN" ORDER BY A.SIGNUP_DATE DESC

SELECT a.NICKNAME, b.POST_COUNT, c.REVIEW_COUNT, d.FREE_COUNT, e.COMMENT_COUNT, f.Total, g.SCHEDULE_COUNT FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 5) a , ( select count(*) POST_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 5 ) b , ( select count(*) REVIEW_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 5 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "리뷰" ) c , ( select count(*) FREE_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 5 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "자유" ) d , ( select count(*) COMMENT_COUNT from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 5 ) e , ( select (( select count(*) POST_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 5 ) + ( select count(*) COMMENT_COUNT from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 5 ) ) Total) f , (select count(*) SCHEDULE_COUNT from SCHEDULES where MEMBER_CODE = 5 ) g;

SELECT A.NICKNAME, B.POST_CODE, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTEXT, B.POST_DATE, B.MAIN_CATEGORY, B.SUB_CATEGORY, B.VEF_STATUS, C.REVIEW_COUNT, D.Total FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15) A , ( select * from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "리뷰" ) B , ( select count(*) REVIEW_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "리뷰" ) C , ( select (( select count(POST_CODE) from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) + ( select count(COMMENT_CODE) from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) ) Total) D ORDER BY B.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NICKNAME, B.POST_CODE, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTEXT, B.POST_DATE, B.MAIN_CATEGORY, B.SUB_CATEGORY, B.VEF_STATUS, C.FREE_COUNT, D.Total FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 8) A , ( select * from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 8 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "자유" ) B , ( select count(*) FREE_COUNT from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 8 AND MAIN_CATEGORY = "자유" ) C , ( select (( select count(POST_CODE) from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 8 ) + ( select count(COMMENT_CODE) from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 8 ) ) Total) D ORDER BY B.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NICKNAME, B.COMMENT_CODE, B.POST_CODE, B.COMMENT_CONTEXT, B.COMMENT_DATE, C.COMMENT_COUNT, D.Total FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15) A , ( select * from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15) B , ( select count(*) COMMENT_COUNT from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) C , ( select (( select count(POST_CODE) from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) + ( select count(COMMENT_CODE) from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) ) Total) D ORDER BY B.COMMENT_DATE DESC
SELECT A.COMMENT_CODE, A.COMMENT_DATE, B.POST_CODE, B.MAIN_CATEGORY FROM COMMENTS A LEFT JOIN POST B ON A.POST_CODE = B.POST_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = 15 ORDER BY A.COMMENT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NICKNAME, B.Total, D.SCHEDULE_COUNT, C.SCHEDULE_CODE, C.MEMBER_CODE, C.SCHEDULE_TITLE, C.SCHEDULE_DATE, C.SCHEDULE_CONTEXT FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15) A , ( select (( select count(POST_CODE) from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) + ( select count(COMMENT_CODE) from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) ) Total) B , (select count(*) SCHEDULE_COUNT from SCHEDULES where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) D , (select * from SCHEDULES WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15) C

SELECT A.NICKNAME, B.Total, C.SCHEDULE_CODE, C.MEMBER_CODE, C.SCHEDULE_TITLE, C.SCHEDULE_DATE, C.SCHEDULE_CONTEXT FROM (select NICKNAME NICKNAME from MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15) A , ( select (( select count(POST_CODE) from POST where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) + ( select count(COMMENT_CODE) from COMMENTS where MEMBER_CODE = 15 ) ) Total) B , (select * from SCHEDULES WHERE MEMBER_CODE = 15 AND SCHEDULE_CODE = #{code}) C
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULES ( SCHEDULE_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_CONTEXT ) VALUES ( NULL, #{memberCode}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleDate}, #{scheduleContext} )
